sdata.j: あんな↑底↑↓そこ↓の↑厚↑↓あつ↓い|サンダル|↑履↑↓は↓いてたら、↑転↑↓ころ↓んで↑捻挫↑↓ねんざ↓しちゃうぞ。
sdata.e: You're going to fall and sprain your ankle wearing sandals with such huge platforms.

sdata.j: 「↑言↑↓い↓い↑忘↑↓わす↓れてたけど|サンダル|↑要↑↓い↓るから↑持↑↓も↓ってきてね」「え、それもっと↑早↑↓はや↓く↑言↑↓い↓ってよ」
sdata.e: I forgot to tell you but, I need sandals so bring them. "Huh? You should have told me earlier."
I bought a pair of sandals.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓とお↑揃↑↓そろ↓いの|サンダル|を↑買↑↓か↓ったの。
sdata.e: I bought a pair of sandals that match him.
